0: If you folks value me as a loyal customer you need to improve your accommodations and service
We love the complimentary breakfast which has lots of wonderful choices and the managers reception
Comfortable convenient great amenities and has friendly staff
Free WLAN in the corner of the lobby close to Starbucks
Facility has a good Happy Hour reception every day
Played Pokemon go in the lobby it was was cool and clean
The hotel lobby was impressive with the indoor fountain and garden
The room was very comfortable and the afternoon reception and continental breakfast was top notch
Two hour reception with an open bar in the evening and an excellent complimentary breakfast
1: It was ok for a short stay but there are no amenities
The lobby and rooms were under renovation
The lobby of the hotel was also being renovated
Additionally the hotel is located in downtown Tampa where in addition to the facility construction one has to deal with local construction
The hotel lobby looked like a refugee camp
Reached the hotel and found out that what once was the lobby breakfast area and the “ in house “ bar restaurant is now a construction site
Breakfast and managers happy hour were served in the lobby and the breakfast was standard buffet like I would find at any other hotel
My family and I waited for a elevator for over 15 minutes
To the point now the facility itself was typical of other Embassy Suites
2: We sat in the lobby for over 3 hours because the room was not ready
Elevators were always a wait with the longest about 15 minutes
Around 90AM on both days we saw a lot of people holding their plates in their laps and eating in the lobby
4 elevators and one was broken down by the afternoon
There was nowhere to sit for happy hour reception or for breakfast and line was out the door
Only issue was elevators were problomatic especially with rushrd of people getting in or out of rooms at same time windows
Then if you want to take the stairs they are outside in the rain
Noise from the Construction Nearby We were on the 18th Floor and Still Could Hear the Beeping on Back Up alarms on Heavy Equipment first thing in the morning
The elevators are so loud in the lobby but try to sleep with the noise
The staff was unaccommodating had to use stairs because one of the elevators was out20 min wait time had to wait 45 minutes to get our car from valet
